channel.title: tidyr on Playing with data

item.title: Function of the week: uncount
item.description: Background I like the idea of short posts focussing on one function because there are so many great functions out there. I had been thinking about doing a function a week for a while and even pitched it to the data science podcast. Uncount You often get summarised/ cross-tabbed data
